said: You return home from a long adventure and find your dear friend, Johnny, has fallen ill.
Hey, bro.  I just realized no matter what I do, Justin Bieber will always have existed.  I feel ill.
YOLO.  Anyways, can you get me some medicine?
I think what I need is some Octopus juice.
I’m not sure. If only we had some sort of massive database that held all of the world’s collective knowledge and would one day probably take over the world....
